column1: My name's Honey Boo Boo and I'm a beauty queen, bitches.  I'm fat as a whale and I don't give two shits, girl!
I'm only six and I've already had three heart attacks, girlfriend!
Yeah! No wait! That pig over there gave me the evil eye! I wuant that one! I waunt  that one!
I want that one's heart! It looked at me funny!
I'm gonna tell them "my heart is sweeter than bacon, child!"
This is myyy scaaar 'cause I got a pig heart. My scar makes me sassy, child!
